nodes.text: More than a decade before the Great Sith War, a young Human blacksmith named Shas Dovos discovered a Sith armory replete with dark side lore within the jungles of his homeworld of Onderon. Null pilfered a Sith spellbook from among the treasures, one that was also the residence of a malevolent Sith spirit. Dovos was unwittingly guided in his studies by the spirit, and from the knowledge therein, he created a suit of magical Sith armor.
